thread.title_full: Candidates for Charleston City Council, District 5 - Post and Courier

author: postandcourier.com
text:
Brian Byrd × Brian Byrd Age: 37
Residence: Johns Island
Occupation: Attorney
 political science, Hampden-Sydney College; University of Mississippi School of Law
 762-2107, votebrianbyrd@gmail.com , www.votebrianbyrd.com
 Spending time with family, kayaking, playing soccer
 Nearly every job I’ve held has involved helping people, and I take pride in my ability to relate to and interact with people from all walks of life.
 Accessibility. I will provide effective and accountable representation through constant and open communication with the residents of District 5.
Marvin D. Wagner Age: 66
Residence: Carolina Bay- Outer West Ashley
Occupation: President and owner of M.D. Wagner Inc.
 accounting, Charleston Southern University; attended Webster University
 2011
Contact information: (843) 729-5155; mdwagner@bellsouth.net ; and on Facebook at MarvinWagnerforCityCouncil
 Playing with the grandchildren and enjoying my family and friends
 As incumbent, I have developed strong relationships with other council members and city staff. I am a veteran, an accountant and educator, and 50-year resident who truly cares about Charleston.
 Infrastructure improvements including Interstate 526 completion, Johns Island “pitchfork”, and Main Road improvements. Regarding drainage, we need a complete review of the storm-water system in outer West Ashley.
